column4: gnomeshell is part of gnome3 with other techs. " Is gnomeshell gnome3? " short answer would be yes

thanks for the reply. I just don't like gnome-shell. it looks very weird to me. It doesn't look like a desktop manager anymore. That's why I am asking this question. If gnome3 will look like gnome-shell, I am thinking to switch to kde4.
use whatever you want; this is free software.
ok, thanks. I was just wondering how gnome3 will look like. it's very hard to find this infomation by googling.
